articles.title: Apple might be building its own AI ‘answer engine’
articles.description: Apple is reportedly working to create a lightweight competitor to ChatGPT.
articles.author: Anthony Ha

articles.title: Mastercard denies pressuring game platforms, Valve tells a different story
articles.description: Mastercard seemingly denied playing a role in a recent marketplace crackdown on games with adult content, while Valve says the pressure was indirect.
articles.author: Anthony Ha

articles.title: SAP is acquiring SmartRecruiters
articles.description: SAP has reached an agreement to acquire SmartRecruiters, with SmartRecruiters' software complementing SAP's existing HR tools.
articles.author: Anthony Ha

articles.title: Inside OpenAI’s quest to make AI do anything for you
articles.description: OpenAI developed the first AI reasoning model less than a year ago, but the technology has shifted Silicon Valley's focus to agents.
articles.author: Maxwell Zeff

articles.title: The uproar over Vogue’s AI-generated ad isn’t just about fashion
articles.description: “Modeling as a profession is already challenging enough without having to compete with now new digital standards of perfection that can be achieved
articles.author: Rebecca Bellan, Dominic-Madori Davis
